title: T202 Hassan - Center Panel Collection (22 Different 3 HOF'ers) SOLD
author: D. Bergin

posts.post_title: T202 Hassan - Center Panel Collection (22 Different 3 HOF'ers) SOLD
posts.post_content:
T202 Hassan Collection of (22) Different Center Panels

Economical way to pick up a nice little stack of some vintage and attractive Baseball T-cards...even if they are technically only 1/3 of a card each.

Includes:

Lot of 22 different, including 3 HOF cards (at least among those that are identified).

Ed Walsh "Close at the Plate" card / Sam Crawford "A Wide Throw Saves Crawford" (low-grade) / "The Athletic Infield" with Eddie Collins, Frank Home Run Baker ++

 There is also a nice Jim Delahanty card in there.

If you squint hard enough, you can also pretend that Russ Ford looks just like a right-handed teenaged Babe Ruth, playing for St. Mary's. ;)

Condition varies as shown in the scans. If you need bigger scans, let me know and I'll e-mail them to you.

How about less then 8 bucks each for the lot. 

SOLD (Shipped in the U.S.) for the set of (22) 

Pay almost any way you like.

PM to reserve or e-mail me at David at Boxingtreasures dot com

Thanks.

Price bump with

 "The Athletic Infield" panel with Eddie Collins, Home Run Baker ++, I have left in my other listing.

Price bump

22 Different now.

SOLD Shipped including "The Athletic Infield" with Frank Baker and Eddie Collins

Last bump before Ebay.

Promise!  ;)
